turns.content:
turn these bullets into a headline for my landing page consulting business: "They will be a Published Author of a Hard Cover Book. (90 Days)

... so that you can land top paying speaking gigs and be seen as a leader in your industry through Credibility, Authority, Prestige."
"Become a Published Author and Boost Your Credibility, Authority, and Prestige in Just 90 Days!"

1. "Transform Your Expertise into a Hardcover Book and Elevate Your Professional Standing in 90 Days"
2. "Establish Yourself as a Thought Leader with a Published Book in 90 Days"
3. "Achieve Credibility, Authority, and Prestige as a Published Author in 90 Days"
4. "Publish Your Book and Attract High-Paying Speaking Gigs in 90 Days"
5. "Boost Your Professional Profile with a Published Book in 90 Days"
